summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Wednesday, July 31, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of the prison's staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as assigned to SHU 1/4 on the roster for the 6:00-14:00 shift.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Appears in change records, initially listed as on 'Sick/Annual' leave for the INTERNAL post, then removed from that status.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staffing
events.description: Standard daily operations and staffing at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, including post assignments, shift changes, and leave tracking for 109 correctional services staff.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated Wednesday, July 31, 2019.
The document details shift assignments, leave statuses (Sick Leave, Annual Leave, LWOP, AWOL), and post changes for correctional officers.
Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell at the MCC New York in the early morning hours of August 10, 2019, approximately 10 days after this roster was generated.
The roster shows standard prison operations with no direct mention of Epstein, specific high-profile inmates, or unusual security protocols.
It records a total of 109 Correctional Services Staff and 12 Non-Correctional Services Staff on duty that day.
